statements: SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Ethereum' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances ORDER BY user_id DESC, last_updated ASC, cryptocurrency;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, cryptocurrency, balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE balance > 5000 AND cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT user_id, cryptocurrency, balance, last_updated FROM wallet_balances WHERE cryptocurrency IN ('Ethereum', 'Bitcoin') ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT user_id, cryptocurrency, FORMAT(balance, 2) AS formatted_balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 12345 AND balance < 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_wallet_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_wallet_balances
SELECT * FROM user_wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 100
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, cryptocurrency, balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice'
SELECT user_id, cryptocurrency FROM wallet_balances ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.*, w.balance FROM users u JOIN wallet_balances w ON u.user_id = w.user_id;
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT u.username, w.cryptocurrency, w.balance FROM users u JOIN wallet_balances w ON u.user_id = w.user_id WHERE w.balance > 1000;
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_balance
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT currency_name, symbol FROM cryptocurrency
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_balance WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM wallet_balance WHERE balance > 500 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT currency_name, symbol FROM cryptocurrency WHERE currency_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_info;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_info ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_balance WHERE balance < 100;
SELECT user_id, name, symbol FROM cryptocurrency WHERE name LIKE 'Bit%';
SELECT user_id, crypto_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_balance WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_info WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT name, symbol FROM cryptocurrency WHERE name IN ('Bitcoin', 'Ethereum') ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT user_id, crypto_id, balance FROM user_crypto_balance WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY user_id, crypto_id;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, crypto_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
